instructions: Heat 1.1l to 68°C (about 2 minutes). You may want to use a small, clean, and sanitized pot for steeping.
Add 0.11kg of Caramel / Crystal 80L (0.8 GU), 0.11kg of Pale Chocolate (0.8 GU), 0.06kg of Black Malt (0.4 GU) and steep for 20 minutes.
Top up the wort to 9.5l and heat to a rolling boil (about 24 minutes).
Flame out. Begin chilling to 20°C and aerate the cooled wort (about 20 minutes).
Pitch Windsor Ale Yeast and seal the fermenter. You should see bubbles in the airlock within 24 hours.
Relax, don't worry and have a homebrew!
